cheatsheet.name: Create the Eclipse Browser Plug-in
cheatsheet.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create and extend a plug-in that contributes an Eclipse Browser view to the Eclipse SDK.

cheatsheet.name: Create the Eclipse Browser RCP Application
cheatsheet.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create a standalone, fully-branded Eclipse Browser rich client application.

category.name: Fundamentals of Plug-in and RCP Development
